subs.title: odd pages should translate toward center in LTR

should flip page with mouse drag
should cancel flip if dragged back before release
should flip with fast swipe even if short distance

should have odd/even classes on pages
should have data-page-index on all pages

should have z-index set on pages
should have perspective set on flipbook container
should resize pages on viewport change

should flip backward with touch swipe right (LTR)
should not flip when swipe is too short
should allow vertical scrolling within page content
